text: Which of the following is the customer's responsibility in accordance with the Shared Responsibility Model?

answers.text: Updating RDS instance with the newest kernel update.
Installing the latest system updates on Windows on EC2.
Installing anti-malware software on an RDS instance.
Freeing up space on S3 for new RDS backup images.
Installing anti-virus software on an EC2 Windows Instance.
Updating Linux with the newest kernel patch on an EC2.
